Apr 25
Exchanges need volume.

For years, many CEX avoided listing BNB, missing out on the high trading volume of a top 5 coin. Now they're catching up. This increases competition for Binance (CEX) but benefits BNB. I'm pleased to see Kraken supporting BNB.

BNB > Binance.
